true.page: I went to go change into my leather slippers and they’ve vanished!
I’ll have to end the evening early so my slippers can be found!
true.say: I can help you find them.
true.page: I would be eternally grateful if you found any information about them!
From what I heard, a suspicious man was last seen in the courtyard.
No one recognized him, and he didn’t have the gait of a nobleman.

option.say: Your slippers were in the closet all along!
I think your slippers are long gone.
option.page: Ah, well. I’ll just have to get another pair made.

true.page: Thank you for your diligence in getting to the bottom of this mystery!
